alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 8:16PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Craven, southeastern Beaufort and northwestern Pamlico Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 816 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Olympia, or 9 miles north of James City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Askins, Cayton, Olympia, Edward, Royal, Bonnerton, Core Point, South Creek, Ernul, Aurora Ferry Terminal, Fairfield Harbour, Aurora and Bridgeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven
